text: The Samsung Galaxy Watch Active is a smartwatch developed by Samsung Electronics. It was announced on 20 February 2019. The Galaxy Watch Active was scheduled for availability in the United States starting on 8 March 2019. == Specifications == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Model !Galaxy Watch Active |- |+ !Size !40 mm |- ! Colors |Black, Silver, Rose Gold, Sea Green |- !Display |1.1" (28 mm) |- !Resolution | 360 x 360 pixels |- !Part No. !SM-R500 |- !Glass | Corning Gorilla Glass DX+ |- !Processor | Exynos 9110 dual core 1.15 GHz |- !Operating System | Tizen (OS 4.0) |- !Size |39.5 mm x 39.5 mm x 10.5 mm |- !Weight (without strap) |25 g |- !Strap Size | 20 mm |- !Water Resistance | 5 ATM + IP68 |- ! Memory | Bluetooth version: 768 MiB RAM + 4 GiB flash memory |- !Connectivity | * 3G/LTE with eSIM (Galaxy Watch LTE-Version only) * Bluetooth 4.2 * Wi-Fi b/g/n * NFC * A-GPS, GLONASS |- !Sensors | * MEMS Accelerometer * MEMS Gyroscope * MEMS Barometer * Electro-optical sensor (for heart rate monitoring) * Photodetector (for ambient light) |- !Battery |230 mAh (up to 3 days) |} == References == == External links == *Galaxy Watch Active on Samsung Newsroom Category:Consumer electronics brands Category:Products introduced in 2019 Category:Smartwatches Category:Samsung wearable devices
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch Active
